original_title: 怪奇！アンビリーバブル　衝撃！人を殺す呪われた封印写真の謎に迫る!!
overview: A psychic documentary series that summarizes the shocking horror experiences received from the general public. I will introduce a number of cursed psychic photos and approach the astonishing truth lurking behind it. There is no doubt that the horrible images that can't be directly seen will make everyone tremble.
title: Mysterious! Unbelievable Shock! Approaching the mystery of the cursed sealed photo that kills people!
